<div align="center">
  <h3>üöÄ AI-Powered Water Quality Monitoring Platform for India</h3>
  <p><strong>Real-time insights ‚Ä¢ Government data integration ‚Ä¢ Predictive analytics ‚Ä¢ Public health protection</strong></p>
</div>

---

## üåü **Project Highlights**

<table>
<tr>
<td width="50%">

### üéØ **What Makes This Special**

- ü§ñ **AI-Powered Predictions** - Machine learning models forecast pollution events
- üó∫Ô∏è **Interactive Visualization** - Real-time India water quality map
- üèõÔ∏è **Government Data Integration** - Official CPCB and Ministry data sources
- üì± **Full-Stack Solution** - React frontend + Node.js backend + Python ML
- üåê **Public Impact** - Serves 1.4 billion people's water safety needs

</td>
<td width="50%">

### üí° **Key Features**

- ‚úÖ **Real-time monitoring** across Indian water bodies
- ‚úÖ **Risk level assessment** with color-coded alerts
- ‚úÖ **Historical trend analysis** and pattern recognition
- ‚úÖ **Pollution event forecasting** using AI models
- ‚úÖ **Public health alerts** and safety recommendations
- ‚úÖ **Mobile-responsive** design for universal access

</td>
</tr>
</table>

### üß™ **Water Quality Parameters Monitored**

<div align="center">

| Parameter               | üìä Indicator                    | üéØ Purpose             | ‚ö†Ô∏è Risk Level |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ------------- |
| **BOD**                 | Biochemical Oxygen Demand       | üåø Organic pollution   | High          |
| **TDS**                 | Total Dissolved Solids          | üíß Water purity        | Medium        |
| **Heavy Metals**        | Lead, Mercury, Cadmium, Arsenic | ‚ò†Ô∏è Toxic contamination | Critical      |
| **pH Level**            | Acidity/Alkalinity              | ‚öñÔ∏è Chemical balance    | Medium        |
| **Dissolved Oxygen**    | Aquatic life indicator          | üêü Ecosystem health    | High          |
| **Coliform**            | Bacterial contamination         | ü¶Ä Biological safety   | Critical      |
| **Nitrates/Phosphates** | Agricultural runoff             | üåæ Nutrient pollution  | Medium        |

</div>

## üöÄ **Technology Stack**

<div align="center">
  <h3>üé® Modern Tech Stack Powering Water Intelligence</h3>
</div>

### üåê **Frontend Excellence**

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=react,typescript,html,css,javascript" />
</p>
<div align="center">
  
  üì± **React 18** + **TypeScript** for type-safe, responsive UI<br>
  üó∫Ô∏è **Leaflet** for interactive geographical visualization<br>
  ‚ö° **Vite** for fast local development and builds<br>
  üé® **Modern CSS3** + **Responsive Design** for universal access
  
</div>

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Backend Powerhouse**

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=nodejs,express,python,fastapi" />
</p>
<div align="center">
  
  üöÄ **Node.js** + **Express.js** for scalable API architecture<br>
  üêç **Python** for ML training and data ingestion scripts<br>
  üîí **JWT Authentication** + **Bcrypt** password hashing<br>
  ‚úÖ **Input Validation** + **CORS** + **Rate Limiting** security<br>
  üìù **Winston Logger** for structured logging
  
</div>

### üóÑÔ∏è **Database & Storage**

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=postgresql,sqlite,redis" />
</p>
<div align="center">
  
  üó∫Ô∏è **PostgreSQL** + **PostGIS** for spatial data operations<br>
  ‚ö° **Redis** for caching and session management<br>
  üìã **SQLite** for development and testing environments
  
</div>

### ü§ñ **AI/ML Pipeline**

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=python,tensorflow,sklearn" />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/pandas-%23150458.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=pandas&logoColor=white" />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/numpy-%23013243.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=numpy&logoColor=white" />
</p>
<div align="center">
  
  ü§ñ **TensorFlow** + **Scikit-Learn** for predictive modeling<br>
  üìä **Pandas** + **NumPy** for data processing and analysis<br>
  üé® **Matplotlib** + **Plotly** for data visualization
  
</div>

### üê≥ **DevOps & Deployment**

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=docker,git,github,aws" />
</p>
<div align="center">
  
  üê≥ **Docker** containerization for consistent deployments<br>
  üåê **AWS/Cloud** hosting with auto-scaling capabilities<br>
  üîÑ **CI/CD Pipeline** with automated testing and deployment
  
</div>

## üìÅ **Project Architecture**

<div align="center">
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Architecture-Microservices-success?style=for-the-badge&logo=docker&logoColor=white" />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Pattern-MVC-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=architecture&logoColor=white" />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Design-Scalable-orange?style=for-the-badge&logo=scale&logoColor=white" />
</div>

```
üåä aqua-ai-project/
‚îä
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üåê frontend/              # React + TypeScript Application
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üé® src/components/    # Reusable UI components
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üó∫Ô∏è src/pages/        # Route-based page components
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üîß src/hooks/        # Custom React hooks
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìä src/contexts/     # State management contexts
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üåç public/          # Static assets and PWA config
‚îä
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ ‚öôÔ∏è backend/               # Node.js + Express API Server
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üõ£Ô∏è src/routes/       # API endpoint definitions
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üíæ src/models/       # Database models
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üîí src/middleware/   # Auth, validation, error handling
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üóÑÔ∏è src/db/          # Database connection and queries
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üß∞ src/utils/        # Logger and utilities
‚îä
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ ü§ñ ai-models/             # Python ML/AI Pipeline
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìä models/          # Trained ML models (.pkl files)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üî¨ training/        # Model training scripts
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üîç evaluation/      # Model performance metrics
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üìù preprocessing/   # Data cleaning and feature engineering
‚îä
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üì¶ data-pipeline/         # Government Data Integration
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìä collectors/      # API data fetching modules
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üßπ cleaners/         # Data validation and cleaning
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üîÑ schedulers/       # Automated data sync jobs
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üìä transformers/    # Data format standardization
‚îä
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üóÑÔ∏è database/             # Database Schema & Migrations
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üèóÔ∏è migrations/       # Database version control
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üå± seeds/            # Sample data for development
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ schema.sql        # PostgreSQL + PostGIS schema
‚îä
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üê≥ docker-compose.yml    # Multi-container orchestration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìö docs/                 # Comprehensive documentation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üõ†Ô∏è .github/workflows/    # CI/CD automation
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üìù README.md             # This beautiful documentation!
```

````

## üöÄ **Quick Start Guide**

<div align="center">
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Setup_Time-5_Minutes-00C851?style=for-the-badge&logo=clock&logoColor=white" />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Difficulty-Beginner-4CAF50?style=for-the-badge&logo=checkmark&logoColor=white" />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/One_Command-Deploy-FF6B35?style=for-the-badge&logo=rocket&logoColor=white" />
</div>

### ‚ö° **Lightning Fast Setup**

<table>
<tr>
<td width="50%">

#### 1Ô∏è‚É£ **Clone & Navigate**
```bash
git clone https://github.com/Kuldeep2822k/aqua-ai.git
cd aqua-ai
````

#### 2Ô∏è‚É£ **Install Dependencies**

```bash
# Install root dependencies (also installs backend via postinstall)
npm install

# Install frontend dependencies
cd frontend && npm install && cd ..

# Optional: install Python dependencies for AI + data pipeline
pip install -r requirements.txt
pip install -r data-pipeline/requirements.txt
```

#### 2.5Ô∏è‚É£ **Configure Environment**

```bash
# Copy environment template
cp .env.example .env.development

# Edit .env.development with your settings:
# - Database connection (PostgreSQL)
# - JWT secret key
# - API keys (optional)
```

#### 2.6Ô∏è‚É£ **Setup Database**

```bash
# Run database migrations
npm run db:migrate

# (Optional) Seed sample data
npm run db:seed
```

</td>
<td width="50%">

#### 3Ô∏è‚É£ **Launch Application**

```bash
# Terminal 1: start backend API
cd backend && npm run dev

# Terminal 2: start frontend
cd frontend && npm run dev
```

#### 4Ô∏è‚É£ **Access Your Dashboard**

- üåê **Frontend**: http://localhost:5173
- ‚öôÔ∏è **Backend API**: http://localhost:5000
- üìä **Interactive Map**: Ready to explore!

</td>
</tr>
</table>

### üê≥ **Docker One-Click Deploy**

<div align="center">
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Docker-Ready-2496ED?style=for-the-badge&logo=docker&logoColor=white" />
</div>

```bash
# Complete stack deployment with Docker
docker-compose up -d

# üéâ That's it! Your Aqua-AI platform is live!
```

<table>
<tr>
<td width="25%" align="center">
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/üó∫Ô∏è-Interactive_Map-4472C4?style=for-the-badge" /><br><br>

## üèóÔ∏è **System Architecture**

<div align="center">
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Architecture-Event_Driven-success?style=for-the-badge" />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Scalability-Horizontal-blue?style=for-the-badge" />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Performance-Optimized-orange?style=for-the-badge" />
</div>

![System Architecture](https://mermaid.-IERcbiAgICBDIC0tPiBEXG4gICAgRCAtLT4gR1xuICAgIEQgLS0-IEhcbiAgICBEIC0tPiBJXG4gICAgRyAtLT4gSlxuICAgIEogLS0-IEtcbiAgICBLIC0tPiBMXG4gICAgTCAtLT4gRCIsICJtZXJtYWlkIjogeyJ0aGVtZSI6ICJkZWZhdWx0In19)

<div align="center">

### üêç **Detailed Architecture Flow**

| Layer           | Technology           | Purpose           | Scalability      |
| --------------- | -------------------- | ----------------- | ---------------- |
| üåê **Frontend** | React + TypeScript   | Interactive UI/UX | CDN Distribution |
| ‚öôÔ∏è **Backend**  | Node.js + Express    | API Services      | Load Balancing   |
| üóÑÔ∏è **Database** | PostgreSQL + PostGIS | Spatial Data      | Read Replicas    |
| ü§ñ **AI/ML**    | Python + TensorFlow  | Predictions       | Model Serving    |
| üìä **Cache**    | Redis                | Performance       | Clustering       |

</div>

---

## üèÜ **Hackathon Impact & Innovation**

<div align="center">
  <h3>üåç Addressing India's Most Critical Environmental Challenge</h3>
</div>

<table>
<tr>
<td width="50%">

### üìä **Problem Scope**

- üåä **600M+ People** affected by water pollution
- üè• **70% of Surface Water** contaminated
- üí∞ **‚Çπ3 Trillion** economic impact annually
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **2M Deaths/year** from water-related diseases

</td>
<td width="50%">

### üöÄ **Our Solution Impact**

- ü§ñ **AI-Powered** early warning system
- üèõÔ∏è **Government Data** integration
- üìä **Real-time** public access to water data
- üìà **Predictive Analytics** for policy makers

</td>
</tr>
</table>

### üë©‚Äçüíª **How to Contribute**

1. üç¥ **Fork** the repository
2. üå± **Create** your feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)
3. ‚ú® **Commit** your changes (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)
4. üöÄ **Push** to the branch (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)
5. üéâ **Open** a Pull Request
